name: PaintShop Pro Picture Tube File
summary: A PSPTUBE file contains a picture tube created by PaintShop Pro, an image editor for Windows. It stores one or more graphics that you can dispense onto a canvas. PSPTUBE files also include settings, such as the cell arrangement and placement of the graphics that make up the paint tube.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PSPTUBE file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
images.alt: PSPTUBE file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
